Class javax.speech.synthesis.SpeakableAdapter 

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--javax.speech.synthesis.SpeakableAdapter
public class SpeakableAdapter
extends Object
implements SpeakableListener
Adapter that receives events associated with spoken output of a Speakable object. The methods in this class are empty; this class is provided as a convenience for easily creating listeners by extending this class and overriding only the methods of interest.
